sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { PageWrapper, Ibridge, ChainSelect, Separator, MaxButton, WrapButton } from './styleds' import { Text, Box, ToggleButtons, Button } from '@pangolindex/components' import { useActiveWeb3React } from 'src/hooks' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import { useWalletModalToggle } from 'src/state/application/hooks' import { QuestionAnswer } from './TabulationBox' const BridgeUI = () => { const { account } = useActiveWeb3React() const { t } = useTranslation() const toggleWalletModal = useWalletModalToggle() const renderButton = () => { if (!account) { return ( ) } else { return ( ) } } return ( Cross Chain From Destination Amount 25% 50% 75% 100% {renderButton()} ) } export default BridgeUI
